cesdspy.models¶

cesdspy.models.get(api_url, model_id)¶

Get the model description object

Parameters:
  • api_url (string) – The base url to query
  • model_id (string) – The ID of the model to get
Returns:

The model information
Return type:

json

Example

import cesdspy
cesdspy.models.get('http://1lv11lamb01.nrel.gov:8091/models/RSF2v0')
cesdspy.models.get response¶
{
  "record_id_var": "time",
  "variables": [
    {
      "display": {
        "shortlabel": "Time",
        "label": "Time Stamp"
      },
      "domain": {
        "set": {
          "options": []
        }
      },
      "is_input": false,
      "var_id": "time"
    },
    {
      "display": {
        "shortlabel": "Seconds",
        "label": "POSIX Seconds"
      },
      "domain": {
        "interval": {
          "bounds": [
            315558000,
            null
          ]
        }
      },
      "is_input": false,
      "var_id": "epoch",
      "units": {
        "scale": 1,
        "SI": [
          0,
          0,
          1,
          0,
          0,
          0,
          0,
          0
        ]
      }
    },
    ...
  ],
  "model_id": "RSF2v0",
  "time_key": "epoch",
  "model_uri": "http://www.nrel.gov/sustainable_nrel/rsf.html#RSF2v0",
  "generation": 1472745315,
  "description": "Selected power meters from the RSF 2",
  "label": "RSF 2 Version 0",
  "record_count": 189101,
  "tags": {
    "DC.source": "https://skyspark-ops.nrel.gov/proj/nrel",
    "DC.description": "Selected power meters from the RSF 2",
    "DC.creator": "Brian W Bush <brian.bush@nrel.gov>"
  }
}
cesdspy.models.issue_command(api_url, model_id, body={})¶

Issue a command to a model

Parameters:
  • api_url (str) – The base url to query
  • model_id (string) – The ID of the model to get
  • body (json) – The command to issue
Returns:

The result of the issued command
Return type:

json

Example

import cesdspy
body = {
    "command": "get_model_strategy"
}
cesdspy.models.issue_command('http://1lv11lamb01.nrel.gov:8091/', 'RSF2v0', body)
cesdspy.models.issue_command response¶
{
    "result" : "TODO"
}
cesdspy.models.list(api_url)¶

get a set model id

Parameters:api_url (string) – The base url to query
Returns:The set of model IDs
Return type:array

Example

import cesdspy
cesdspy.models.list('http://1lv11lamb01.nrel.gov:8091/')
cesdspy.models.list response¶
["RSF2v0"]
